about-p: Ndi umuntu wiyemeje kandi ufite intego, nshishikajwe no guhindura ibyifuzo mu by’ukuri. Mfite ubushake bukomeye bwo gukura, gutera imbere no kugira ingaruka nziza, buri gihe nshaka uburyo bushya bwo kubaka, gushishikariza no gukora agaciro kahoraho. Nishimira ubuziranenge no guhinduka, urugendo rwanjye ruyobowe n’icyerekezo gisobanutse cy’intsinzi, guhanga udushya, no gukora itandukaniro rifatika.
about-h2: Umushushanyi wa UI/UX & Umutekinisiye w’Ibyerekeranye na Web
about-p-2: Ndi umushushanyi w’umuhanga wa UI/UX hamwe n’umutekinisiye w’imbere wa web, nshishikajwe no kubaka imbuga za interineti zigezweho kandi zoroshye gukoresha.
about-li-strong-8: Ubushobozi bwo Gukora Ku Giti Cyawe:
about-p-3: Nshimishwa no gutanga imishinga ifite ireme kandi igaragaza neza, ituma abakoresha banyurwa. Ubuhanga bwanjye burimo gushushanya UI/UX, iterambere ry’imbere (frontend), no gukora uburambe bworoshye mu ikoranabuhanga.
about-skills-p: N specialize mu iterambere rya web imbere n’inyuma (frontend na backend), mbaka imbuga za interineti zifite ubushobozi bwo guhinduka no kwihuta.
resume-work-sub-1-p-3: Gutoza abantu no gucunga amakuru y’isosiyete
resume-work-sub-2-p-1: Umutekinisiye wa frontend - Golden Art Painting
portfolio-prt-7-h: Isoko ry’Ubucuruzi bwa Art ku Murongo
services-sub-1-p: Dukora imbuga za interineti zigezweho kandi zisubiza, ziteye imbere hakurikijwe ibyo ukeneye, harimo urubuga rw’ubucuruzi, CMS, na porogaramu za web. Imbuga zacu ziteguwe kugira ngo zihute, zikorwe neza kuri telefone, kandi zibe nziza kuri SEO kugira ngo zirusheho kugaragara no gushimisha abakoresha.
services-sub-2-p: Serivisi z’umwuga zo gushushanya ibishushanyo zirimo logos, kwerekana ikirango, ibikoresho byo kwamamaza, hamwe no gushushanya UI/UX. Dukora ibishushanyo byiza byerekana isura y’ikigo, byongera uburyo abakiriya bitabira, kandi dutambutsa ubutumwa bwawe neza mu itangazamakuru rya digitale na printi.
services-sub-3-p: Dutanga ibisubizo bya digitale bigamije korohereza imikorere y’ubucuruzi. Serivisi zacu zirimo uburyo bwo gufata gahunda ku murongo, kwishyura mu buryo butekanye, gutunganya imirimo byikora, ibikoresho bishingiye ku bicu, hamwe no kugisha inama mu by’ikoranabuhanga. Dufasha ibikorwa kugera ku musaruro mwinshi kandi twita ku buryo abakoresha babona serivisi neza kandi byoroshye.
services-sub-4-p: Dufasha ibikorwa gufata ibyemezo bishingiye ku bipimo n’ubusesenguzi. Tugaragaza uburyo bwo gukusanya amakuru, kuyerekana, no gukurikirana imikorere kugira ngo tumenye ibyerekezo, dutunganye imikorere, kandi duteze imbere iterambere ry’ingamba. Ubusobanuro bwacu bufasha ibikorwa kuguma imbere mu masoko y’ibikorwa byinshi.
testimonial-1-p: Gukorana na Tresor byari uburambe bwiza. Yubaka urubuga rw’ubucuruzi bwanjye guhera ku busa, kandi rwaje kurusha uko nabyifuzaga. Yumvise neza ibyo nkeneye kandi yampaye inama zahinduye byinshi. Ubu mfite urubuga rugaragara nk’umwuga kandi ruzana abakiriya benshi.
testimonial-2-p: Nitabiriye amahugurwa ya ICT y’ibanze ya Tresor kandi byamfashije kwiyizera gukoresha mudasobwa. Uburyo yigishamo burihangana kandi bunoze, asobanura n’ibigoranye mu buryo bworoshye. Ndamusaba cyane cyane ku bantu bashya mu bikoresho bya digitale cyangwa bashaka kongera ubumenyi.
testimonial-3-p: Tresor yampaye ubufasha mu gucunga imbuga nkoranyambaga zanjye kandi yanyeretse uko nakoreshya neza ibikubiye mu nkuru. Instagram yanjye ubu isa neza kandi mbona abakurikirana benshi. Ni umwuga, w’umuhanga, kandi byoroshye gukorana na we.
testimonial-4-p: Twashakaga urubuga rwo gusangiza ibikorwa by’umuryango, kandi Tresor yatuzaniye ibyo twasabye neza. Yari asobanutse ku buryo bwo gukora, yahoraga ku gihe kandi agirana itumanaho ryiza. Igikorwa cya nyuma cyari gisubiza vuba, gisukuye, kandi cyoroshye kugenzura.
testimonial-5-p: Nagize amahirwe yo gukorana na Tresor ku mushinga wa web app. Kwitonda kwe ku bisobanuro no gukurikiza gahunda mu gukodesha code byanteye amatsiko. Ashoboye gusobanura imirimo igoye no gukemura ibibazo afite intego n’ubushishozi.
testimonial-6-p: Tresor yampaye inkunga yo gushira mu bikorwa igitekerezo cyanjye. Sinari nzi aho natangirira, ariko yampaye inzira intambwe ku yindi. Guhera ku gishushanyo cya mbere kugeza ku bice bya backend byose byitabweho. Nshimira cyane umusaruro n’ubufasha bwe.
faq-ans-1-p-1: Ntanga serivisi za digitale zigezweho zigamije gufasha abantu ku giti cyabo, ubucuruzi buto, n’imiryango. Intego yanjye nyamukuru ni iterambere rya web, gukora imbuga zihuta, zigaragara neza kandi zifite akamaro. Niba ari urubuga rw’umuntu, ubucuruzi, cyangwa application yihariye, ndubaka ibisubizo bihuje n’intego zawe.
faq-ans-1-p-2: Uretse iterambere, ntanga amahugurwa ya ICT agamije gufasha abantu kwiyizera mu gukoresha ibikoresho bya digitale, cyane cyane abatangizi bashaka kwiga ibanze kuri mudasobwa, Microsoft Office, cyangwa internet. Isomo ryange rishingiye ku bikorwa bifatika by’umunsi ku munsi, byoroshye gusobanukirwa no gukoresha.
faq-ans-1-p-3: Nanone ncunga imbuga nkoranyambaga ku bakiriya bashaka kongera abakurikirana cyangwa kunoza itumanaho ryo kuri internet. Uhereye ku migambi y’ibikubiye mu nkuru kugeza ku gushyira ubutumwa buri munsi no kugirana umubano n’abakurikira, mfasha abantu n’ibirango kubaka umwimerere no guhuza ku mbuga nka Instagram na Facebook.
faq-qtn-2: Uraboneka ku kazi ka freelance cyangwa amasezerano?
faq-ans-2-p-1: Yego, mboneka ku kazi ka freelance cyangwa amasezerano y’igihe gito. Nkunda gukora ku mishinga ifite intego n’akamaro, yaba ari igihe gito cyangwa kirekire. Niba ufite igitekerezo cyumvikana cyangwa ushaka umuntu wo kugufasha kugishyira mu bikorwa, ntegereje kuganira no gufasha.
faq-ans-2-p-2: Kubera ko nkora ku gice cy’igihe, nshobora kwita ku mishinga mike icyarimwe kandi ntanga umwanya uhagije kuri buri mushinga. Nizera kubaka umubano w’igihe kirekire n’abakiriya banjye kandi mba inyangamugayo ku bihe n’ibyiyemezo kugira ngo byose bisobanuke neza.
faq-ans-2-p-3: Ntugire ubwoba bwo kuvugana nanjye nubwo utazi aho watangirira. Akenshi kuganira gusa bishobora kugaragaza uko twakorana cyangwa niba ndi umuntu ukwiye ku mushinga wawe.
faq-ans-3-p-1: Uburyo bwiza bwo kumbona ni kuri email cyangwa Instagram, aho mboneka cyane kandi nsohora vuba. Email itanga uburyo bwo kuganira mu buryo bwemewe no gusangira amakuru y’umushinga, naho Instagram ikaba nziza ku butumwa bwihuse, gusubiza vuba, cyangwa kureba imirimo n’imiterere yanjye.
faq-ans-3-p-2: Ushobora kohereza ubutumwa unyuze ku rubuga rwanjye rwa internet, cyangwa ukandikira ingeritresor@gmail.com ku bibazo by’umwuga. Ngerageza gusubiza ubutumwa bwose mu minsi 1–2 y’akazi.
faq-ans-3-p-3: Niba ushaka igiciro cy’umushinga, ufite ikibazo ku mahugurwa, cyangwa ushaka gukorana, ntutinye kumenyesha.
faq-qtn-4: Umushinga usanzwe utwara igihe kingana iki?
faq-ans-4-p-1: Igihe umushinga utwara giterwa cyane n’ubunini bwawo, ibyiciro, n’uburyo bwo kuwuhindura. Ku mbuga ntoya cyangwa iz’ubunini bw’ibanze, akenshi ndangiza mu mezi atandatu cyangwa munsi yayo, rimwe na rimwe byihuse ku byoroshye nko ku rubuga rw’umuntu cyangwa urupapuro rw’amakuru.
faq-ans-4-p-2: Ntangira tuganira ku ntego zawe neza kandi tugategura ibyiciro — guhera ku ishusho kugeza ku iterambere no kugerageza. Iyo duteguye neza, iterambere rigenda neza kandi vuba. Nanone mba mbwira amakuru buri gihe kugira ngo ube uzi aho tugeze.
faq-ans-4-p-3: Ntangira tuganira ku ntego zawe neza kandi tugategura ibyiciro — guhera ku ishusho kugeza ku iterambere no kugerageza. Iyo duteguye neza, iterambere rigenda neza kandi vuba. Nanone mba mbwira amakuru buri gihe kugira ngo ube uzi aho tugeze.
faq-qtn-5: Ukorana n’abakiriya baturutse hanze y’igihugu cyawe?
faq-ans-5-p-1: Yego, nubwo ndi mu Rwanda, mfite uburambe bwo gukorana n’abakiriya mpuzamahanga. Akazi kanjye gushingiye kuri digitale kantuma nshobora gukorana n’umuntu wese ku isi hifashishijwe email, ibiganiro by’amashusho, n’ahantu ho gusangira inyandiko.
faq-ans-5-p-2: Intera ntibuza umusaruro. Nzirikana umwuga, itumanaho risobanutse, n’ibihe by’amasaha mugitangirwaho akazi n’abakiriya mpuzamahanga. Nemeza ko ibyifuzo bisobanurwa neza kandi byandikwa mu ntangiriro y’umushinga wese.
faq-ans-5-p-3: Niba uri mu Rwanda cyangwa ahandi hose, ndahari ku bintu bishya n’imikoranire mpuzamahanga.
faq-ans-6-p-1: Ubu, nzirikana cyane Node.js ku iterambere rya backend no ku mikorere ya server rusange. Ni ikoranabuhanga ryoroshye kandi ryizewe mu kubaka porogaramu z’igihe nyacyo n’API. Nanone ukoresha HTML, CSS, JavaScript, na MongoDB ku iterambere rya full-stack.
faq-ans-6-p-2: Vuba aha, nzimurira imishinga myinshi kuri Next.js, urubuga rukomeye rwa React rwagaragaje ko rufite ubushobozi bwo kunoza imikorere no kuzamura imenyekanisha kuri murandasi. Niyemeje gukomeza gutunganya ibikoresho byanjye bya tekiniki nkoresha, nko gukoresha ibigezweho kandi byihuta mu gutanga serivisi zinoze kandi zishobora gukoreshwa ku gipimo kinini.
faq-ans-6-p-3: Uretse frameworks za tekiniki, nshyira imbere uburyo bwo gutunganya CSS mu buryo bunoze (modular), gukoresha imiterere yitaho ibikoresho byose (responsive design), no guhuza na database mu buryo bworoshye kugirango dushyigikire ibintu bikora nk’inkuru, ifishi yo kuvugana, n’inkuta z’imicungire.
faq-qtn-7: Nshobora kubona ingero z’imishinga wakoze mbere?
faq-ans-7-p-1: Nibyo rwose. Umwe mu mishinga yanjye nishimira ni “Zodiac Symbols + Card.” Uyu mushinga urenze igishushanyo gusa—uruhuza agace k’inkuru, ibishushanyo byihariye, n’ibice by’ubufatanye bifite intego. Ugaragaza uburyo nkoresha igishushanyo n’ibikubiyemo kugirango mbwire inkuru ifite akamaro.
faq-ans-7-p-2: Uyu mushinga werekana imicungire yuzuye yanjye ku bijyanye n’uruhande rw’imbere (frontend) no gutunganya isura (styling), kimwe n’ibikorwa by’inyuma (backend). Nanone ugaragaza umuhate wanjye mu gukoresha inkuru nk’igice cy’ingenzi cy’ubufatanye n’umukoresha.
faq-ans-7-p-3: Niba wifuza izindi ngero cyangwa inyandiko zisesenguye ku mishinga, niteguye kuzigusangiza mu biganiro cyangwa nkaguha uburyo bwo kuzireba bitewe n’imiterere y’umushinga.
faq-qtn-8: Ugutanga serivisi nyuma yo kurangiza umushinga birimo?
faq-ans-8-p-1: Yego, ntanga serivisi z’ubufasha bw’igihe kirekire kugirango urubuga rwawe rugume rukora neza kandi rujyanye n’igihe. Inshingano zanjye zirenga gutanga umushinga wuzuye—nshyigikira iterambere n’impinduka zarwo z’igihe kizaza.
faq-ans-8-p-2: Ku bakiriya batari abatekinisiye, ntanga serivisi zuzuye zo kubungabunga urubuga. Ku bakiriya bashishikajwe no kwiga, ntanga ubuyobozi bwo kubafasha kwiyitaho ubwabo. Ubufasha bushobora gutegurwa uko ubishaka—buri kwezi, uko bibaye ngombwa, cyangwa mu byiciro by’igenzura rihoraho.
faq-ans-8-p-3: Wemerewe kumbwira ibitekerezo bishya cyangwa ibisabwa, kandi nzabikora mubihindure ibiranga urubuga rwawe mu buryo bukora.
faq-ans-9-p-1: Igiciro ntanga gishingiye ku rugero rw’umushinga n’ubwiza busabwa. Nzi ko buri mushinga ari udasanzwe, niyo mpamvu mbanza gusesengura ibisabwa mbere yo gutanga igiciro cya nyuma.
faq-ans-9-p-2: Ntanga uburyo butandukanye—gushingira ku mushinga wose, kugabanya mushinga mu byiciro ku minsi miremire, cyangwa igiciro cyoroheje ku bikorwa bito n’amahugurwa. Uburyo bwange bugendera ku kuri no ku busobanuro, nta biciro byihishe.
faq-ans-9-p-3: Mu gihe cy’ikiganiro, nzagusobanurira ibyo igiciro kirimo kandi tugafasha gushyira imbere ibiranga umushinga bijyanye n’ingengo y’imari yawe n’intego.
faq-qtn-10: Dushobora gutegura ikiganiro mbere yo gutangira umushinga?
faq-ans-10-p-1: Yego rwose. Nshishikariza gukora ikiganiro cy’ubuntu, nta nshingano, mbere y’uko dutangira umushinga uwo ariwo wose. Ibi bituma usobanura neza icyifuzo cyawe nanjye nkagufasha kumenya ibishoboka, ibikoresho, n’igihe bizatwara.
faq-ans-10-p-2: Binatuma habaho kumvikana no guhuza ku ntego, bigatuma inama zanjye ziba zihuye n’intego zawe, igihe ufite, n’abagenerwabikorwa bawe.
faq-ans-10-p-3: Ushobora kunshikira kuri email cyangwa kuri Instagram, tukumvikana ku gihe kikwiriye cyo guhura no gutangira urugendo rwacu.
